name: Enter The Cemetery
description:
**GO FULLSCREEN**

Make your way into the cemetery the boring way or the dank way. Either way, you'll be praised.

*This is a fail "game" created in one day using low poly assets. This is simply a small beginner exploration of using switches and physics to control game objects.*

You may ask, "Hey... is that meant to be "real" grass?"

Yes... yes it is.
